page.title: 06LAW AND ORDER.
page.content: The crime rate in Ilfracombe increases considerably during the holiday season. The most common crime is theft. Also there are late night disturbances in the holiday season from Clubs and Disco's. Pick Pockets are quite common in the summer months.On one night there were twelve reports of theft in Ilfracombe. The Police station in Princess Avenue was built in the 1960's. It is not manned twenty four hours a day;the nearest fully manned station is at Barnstaple. Ilfracombe station is the base for officers serving Woolacombe and Combe Martin. There are only thirty four staff from Sergeants to CID. The new station uses modern computers.But the old station was turned into a nightclub called "The Bastille".The nearest court is in Barnstaple.In our survey of adults ( Continued P.7 )
